urls.title: Petition: Ban Water Companies discharging raw sewage into water courses.
urls.description: Ensure Water companies treat the sewage they are responsible for. Not discharge it into rivers and water courses. After all what goes into the ocean comes back as the fish we eat.

text: Good morning @EnvAgency. The renewal for my salmon fishing licence just dropped. £82.00. Is there any way I can reclaim cash for disinfectant for my waders after entering  your sewage filled rivers? Also. If I fish from an unlicensed canoe do I still need a licence?

Here's how next week is looking for me:

MON: No meetings
TUE: @Southsomersetdc regulation
WED: @MendipCouncil planning
THUR: @EnvAgencySW #Wessex flooding and coastal 
FRI: No meetings

#LDReporter #Somerset

We need all windows and doors replacing @RedIndustries2 Are you going to give us the £15k to try and keep your fumes from coming in our house? @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe #stopthes https://t.co/6ys78VZFVW
@MFRFurness @EnvAgency Prevention is better than cure
